description: You can claim up to RM2,500 for purchases on lifestyle-related items such as electronics, sports equipment, and books.
You can claim up to RM6,000 for medical expenses including consultations, treatments, and medication.
Parents can claim up to RM2,000 for education expenses related to their children.
You may claim up to RM7,000 for life insurance premiums and EPF contributions.
Donations to approved institutions are deductible subject to the allowable income percentage.
